entry.p: OK, I need to start podcasting. For those who don't know, podcasting is a kind of do-it-yourself radio and lots of folks are doing it because it's easy and it's a great way to reach people. I'll have plenty of audio content to offer once I get a little more recording equipment, which I hope will happen Real Soon Now [tm]. Like what? Well, there's all the music I've written over the years (recording it will keep me engaged for quite a while), as well as spoken versions of my poems. Not sure what I'll do after I'm finished with my music and poetry, but I'm sure I'll think of something. :-)
